You can move this to `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/arduino15`.

Specify the new directories used by Arduino CLI in arduino-cli.yaml as mentioned in the documentation [here](https://arduino.github.io/arduino-cli/0.29/configuration/).

Add the following alias:
```bash
alias arduino-cli='arduino-cli --config-file $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/arduino15/arduino-cli.yaml'
```

_Relevant issue_: https://github.com/arduino/arduino-cli/pull/140
